meanings.definition: A substance deposited on an electrode by electrolysis.
meanings.sent1: The electrodeposits on the metal plate were shiny.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the electrodeposits under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The electrodeposits seemed to sparkle like tiny stars.
meanings.sent4: The electrodeposits clung to the electrode like magnets to metal.
meanings.sent5: The electrodeposits gleamed in the dim laboratory light.

meanings.definition: The process of depositing a substance on an electrode by electrolysis.
meanings.sent1: The electrodeposits occurred when electricity passed through the solution.
meanings.sent2: The students observed the electrodeposits forming during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The electrodeposits danced around the electrode in a peculiar way.
meanings.sent4: The electrodeposits flowed like a river onto the electrode.
meanings.sent5: The electrodeposits slowly built up layer by layer on the electrode.
